name: enatega-multivendor-orchestrator
description: Root orchestrator to launch all Enatega Multivendor projects

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd enatega-multivendor-admin && npm install && cd ../enatega-multivendor-web && npm install && cd ../enatega-multivendor-app && npm install && cd ../enatega-multivendor-rider && npm install && cd ../enatega-multivendor-store && npm install
